title: How to Make Money on Silkroad Online

steps.headline: Re-roll a character.
steps.description: Choose garment and bow. Using a bow allows you to kill monsters faster. Pick up every drop.

steps.headline: Level up to 5, keeping masteries as high as possible.
Get your Fire imbue (first level 5 skill in Fire tree) and your Anti-Devil Bow skill.
Go ahead and get to level 16.
steps.description: This session will take a long time, but will give you around 100k, depending on the monsters.

steps.headline: Raise masteries to level 7.
steps.description: Level Anti-Devil and Fire imbue levels, add Two Arrow Combo.

steps.headline: Go to Bandit Archers in the Bandit stronghold.
steps.description: Pick up all their drops, especially alchemy materials and armors.

steps.headline: Merchant elements, check around other stalls and sell at a similar price.
Merchant Weapon Elixirs.
steps.description: Buy them around 800k and resell them at around 1m. Buy Accessory Elixirs around 200k and sell at 300k.

steps.headline: Upgrade armor and weapons to +3, +5 or +7 and sell them.
steps.description: Only upgrade 9th, 10th and 11th degree armors and weapons.

text: Re-roll a character. Choose garment and bow. Using a bow allows you to kill monsters faster. Pick up every drop. Level up to 5, keeping masteries as high as possible.  Get your Fire imbue (first level 5 skill in Fire tree) and your Anti-Devil Bow skill. Constantly use Fire imbue. Go ahead and get to level 16. This session will take a long time, but will give you around 100k, depending on the monsters. Raise masteries to level 7. Level Anti-Devil and Fire imbue levels, add Two Arrow Combo. Go to Bandit Archers in the Bandit stronghold. Pick up all their drops, especially alchemy materials and armors. Merchant elements, check around other stalls and sell at a similar price.  Merchant Weapon Elixirs. Buy them around 800k and resell them at around 1m. Buy Accessory Elixirs around 200k and sell at 300k. Upgrade armor and weapons to +3, +5 or +7 and sell them. Only upgrade 9th, 10th and 11th degree armors and weapons.
